channel.title: Legit-its back! [24/7 uptime]rscstake![24/7 uptime] its back!-legit
channel.description:
[24/7]**RscStake**[24/7]
[b][u][i]I HAVE TO WAIT FOR THE DEDI TO GET SET UP IT IS CURRENTLY BEING SET UP AS WE SPEAK THE SOURCE AND FORUMS ARE READY TO GO.[/i][/u][/b]
**EDIT** Dedi setup still working a little on the client forums are up now you can access the forums from http://rscstake.no-ip.org
For the RscStake Vets many of you probally already know who i am, but for those of you who dont then i would like to tell you a little bit of history about RscStake before you decide to join the server. The server was up last year around june, those who played last year and where mad that the server was shut down i am very sorry, as i ran into some legal issue's :S lol. Unlike the last RscStake, this is going to be 100% LEGIT. i myself am a original rsc player and i know how it is to work for something and show for what you have, unlike the rest of these servers where everything is pretty much spoon fed and givin away. Just think of playing RSCA again.
[i][b]UPDATES:[/b][/i] [u]-Fixed[/u] the formulae.java because the mob fighting was messed up along with the pk/staking. Xp rates are set low to make the gameplay that much more enjoyable to play. [u]-Working skills[/u] meaning every skill works. Skilling will be your main sorce of income. [u]-King[/u] black dragons drop all dragon items and black demons drop longs and axes. Remember the drops are as close to the real thing as posible. [u]-Added[/u] global chat for any player that wishes to talk amongst the rsc community. -Shops are now all in 1 ( in general store and isnt packed screen at all ) very useful. [u]-Friendly staff[/u], they are there when you need them and are very user friendly! [u]-100% functional Godstaff/Godspells[/u] (charge is working now to) [u]-Different landscape textures[/u] [u]-Fixed drop rates[/u] on ALL monsters and they are about 99% accurate (never can be sure) [u]-War events[/u], when these go on just pm mods/admins for summons. (mage arena) [u]-Gambling[/u], those of you who love to gamble (besides staking) i am currently working on a lottery system. should be opperation within the week. [u]-Quests[/u], should have ALL working F2P quests by the end of the week then hopefully start working on some P2P Quests.
[i]COMMANDS:[/i] [b]::::::PLAYERS:::::::[/b] ::say - for global chat to talk to everyone. there is no delay so dont abuse or it will be put to 20 secs. ::onlinelist - shows all players and staff online in a list so you can see the names of who are online ::online - just shows how many people are on the server. ::fatigue - sets your fatige to 100% [b] ::::::MODS:::::::[/b] ::info - tells you the info of the player you want to know ::send - sends the player of your choice to the desired destination ::ban - bans what ever player was breaking the rscstake rules ::unban - unban's the player ::modroom - goes to the modroom [u]:::::::::: quick way to travel to the rule breakers::::::::::[/u] ::edge ::lumbridge ::varrock ::faldor ::draynor ::ardy ::teleport - teleport to the x y cords that you wish ::goto - will goto that user ::take/put - will jail that user [b]!!!PICTURES OF CLIENT!!! [i]I only added a few pics of skills or else it would have took alot of pictures ha.. just join the community and you will see that all skills do work.[/i]
[URL=http://img573.imageshack.us/i/clientd.jpg/][IMG]http://img573.imageshack.us/img573/2397/clientd.jpg[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
_________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[URL=http://img641.imageshack.us/i/chargev.jpg/][IMG]http://img641.imageshack.us/img641/6205/chargev.jpg[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
_________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[URL=http://img255.imageshack.us/i/fishingm.jpg/][IMG]http://img255.imageshack.us/img255/8530/fishingm.jpg[/img][/URL]
_________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[URL=http://img209.imageshack.us/i/herblaw.jpg/][IMG]http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/4518/herblaw.jpg[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
_________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[URL=http://img703.imageshack.us/i/sleeping.jpg/][IMG]http://img703.imageshack.us/img703/9044/sleeping.jpg[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
_________________________________________________________________________________________________________ Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL] This is about it for updates and I hope you will come join our Gameplay community as i know you will like it as much as all the other players right now.
Current players online as of 12/7/09 *47* (2 days of being up)
Feel free to contact me at [email]Motocrossracer191@hotmail.com[/email] if you have any further questions reguarding the game. Hope to see some of you soon!!
Thanks, Daniel IGN: Synthetic[/b]

item.title: Legit-its back! [24/7 uptime]rscstake![24/7 uptime] its back!-legit
item.dc:creator: @p2p_mage p2p mage
item.description:
@p2p_mage wrote:

[24/7]RscStake[24/7]

I HAVE TO WAIT FOR THE DEDI TO GET SET UP IT IS CURRENTLY BEING SET UP AS WE SPEAK THE SOURCE AND FORUMS ARE READY TO GO.

EDIT
Dedi setup still working a little on the client forums are up now you can access the forums from http://rscstake.no-ip.org

For the RscStake Vets many of you probally already know who i am, but for those of you who dont then i would like to tell you a little bit of history about RscStake before you decide to join the server. The server was up last year around june, those who played last year and where mad that the server was shut down i am very sorry, as i ran into some legal issueâ€™s :S lol. Unlike the last RscStake, this is going to be 100% LEGIT. i myself am a original rsc player and i know how it is to work for something and show for what you have, unlike the rest of these servers where everything is pretty much spoon fed and givin away. Just think of playing RSCA again.

UPDATES:
-Fixed the formulae.java because the mob fighting was messed up along with the pk/staking. Xp rates are set low to make the gameplay that much more enjoyable to play.
-Working skills meaning every skill works. Skilling will be your main sorce of income.
-King black dragons drop all dragon items and black demons drop longs and axes. Remember the drops are as close to the real thing as posible.
-Added global chat for any player that wishes to talk amongst the rsc community.
-Shops are now all in 1 ( in general store and isnt packed screen at all ) very useful.
-Friendly staff, they are there when you need them and are very user friendly!
-100% functional Godstaff/Godspells (charge is working now to)
-Different landscape textures
-Fixed drop rates on ALL monsters and they are about 99% accurate (never can be sure)
-War events, when these go on just pm mods/admins for summons. (mage arena)
-Gambling, those of you who love to gamble (besides staking) i am currently working on a lottery system. should be opperation within the week.
-Quests, should have ALL working F2P quests by the end of the week then hopefully start working on some P2P Quests.

COMMANDS:
::::::PLAYERS:::::::
::say - for global chat to talk to everyone. there is no delay so dont abuse or it will be put to 20 secs.
::onlinelist - shows all players and staff online in a list so you can see the names of who are online
::online - just shows how many people are on the server.
::fatigue - sets your fatige to 100%

::::::MODS:::::::
::info - tells you the info of the player you want to know
::send - sends the player of your choice to the desired destination
::ban - bans what ever player was breaking the rscstake rules
::unban - unbanâ€™s the player
::modroom - goes to the modroom
:::::::::: quick way to travel to the rule breakers::::::::::
::edge
::lumbridge
::varrock
::faldor
::draynor
::ardy
::teleport - teleport to the x y cords that you wish
::goto - will goto that user
::take/put - will jail that user
[b]!!!PICTURES OF CLIENT!!!
I only added a few pics of skills or else it would have took alot of pictures haâ€¦ just join the community and you will see that all skills do work.

Uploaded with ImageShack.us

Uploaded with ImageShack.us

Uploaded with ImageShack.us

Uploaded with ImageShack.us

Uploaded with ImageShack.us
This is about it for updates and I hope you will come join our Gameplay community as i know you will like it as much as all the other players right now.

Current players online as of 12/7/09 47 (2 days of being up)

Feel free to contact me at Motocrossracer191@hotmail.com if you have any further questions reguarding the game. Hope to see some of you soon!!

Thanks,
Daniel
IGN: Synthetic[/b]

Read full topic
item.source: Legit-its back! [24/7 uptime]rscstake![24/7 uptime] its back!-legit
